58377.「血染めの赤き月 昇りし時……\n 地の底の王 世界に到来し すべての命\n 人:
When the blood-red moon rises, the king of the underworld will come to the world and all life, even the last hope of people, will be
burned to ashes.

58378.「……グレイナル叙事詩の 一節か。: A passage from the Epic of Grainall.

58379.「どうやら 無情なまでに\n すべての条件が 出そろったようだな。:
Apparently, all conditions have been
ruthlessly met.

58380.「民の間では すでに ゴフェル計画が\n 進行している。最後の希望を乗せた箱舟が:
The Gofel Project is already underway among
the people. Will the ark, carrying the last
hope, reach the land of salvation or...

58381.「いやいや…… だが 妙ではないか。: No, no... but isn't it odd.

58382.「グレイナル叙事詩の記述が 真実なのであれば\n 災厄の王の目覚めは まだ\n:
If the Epic of Greygnarl is true, then the awakening of the King of Calamity is an event that is still a hundred years in the future.
...

58384.「叙事詩に記載のない 冥王の襲来と……\n それによる 魔瘴の世界汚染。\n そ:
The Dark Lord's attack, which is not mentioned in the epic poem and... the resulting miasma contaminating the world. And the sealing of
Lendersia...

58385.「それらの出来事が 今この瞬間も\n 世界の歴史を刻む時計の針を\n 狂わせてい:
These events are, at this very moment,
upsetting the hands of the clock that ticks
away the history of the world.

58386.「……つまり もはや 何が起こっても\n 不思議はない……ということだな。:
I mean, it's no longer a surprise what
happens.

58387.「この世界に生を受けた以上 \n 我ら王族とて 世界の一部に過ぎぬ。\n 元より:
Since we were born into this world, we, the
royal family, are only a part of it. There is
no place for us to escape to.

58388.「抗いがたい運命ならば ただ受け入れる。\n それが本当に 抗えぬ運命ならばな。:
If it is an irresistible fate, I just accept
it. If it really is an irresistible fate, I
just accept it.

58389.「ザマ烽火台の導きの紅煙により 我らは\n 一堂に会した。ならば 最後のピースが:
The red smoke of Zama Beacon's guidance has
brought us together. Then it is only a matter
of time before the final piece is in place.

58393.「私は 世告げの姫。\n その主導者 ロディア。:
I am the Oracle Princess. And its leader,
Rhodia.

58394.「白き剣を手に まだ誰も知らぬ\n 明日の世の姿を 告げる者です。:
He is the one who weilds a white sword and
tells of a world of tomorrow that no one yet
knows.

58396.「面白い。聞かせてもらおうではないか。\n 我らのアストルティアが いかにして\:
Interesting. Let us hear it. How will our
Astoltia come to an end?

58397.「星々は こう歌いました……。\n 終末の鐘が鳴りひびく 宿命の時が来たと。:
The stars sang that the doomsday bells were
ringing and the time of destiny had come.

58398.「滅びの運命に対し 私たちができることは\n 多くは 残されていません。:
There is not much left for us to do about our
doom.

58399.「それぞれの種族の王である皆さまに\n 私から お願いがございます。:
I have a request for you, the kings of your
respective species.

58400.「すでに進行している ゴフェル計画が\n 完遂したあかつきに…… 次の時代に\n:
When the Gofel Project, which is already underway, is completed, we would like you to choose the people who will be left alive in
the next generation.

58401.「次の時代に 生き残れるのは……\n 各種族につき １００名が限度です。:
In the next generation, the number of
survivors will be limited to 100 members of
each family.

58404.「我ら種族の王は この冠の下に\n 幾千幾万の民の命を 預かっているのだ。\n:
The king of our species has the lives of
thousands upon thousands of people under his
crown. There is no way to sort them out.

58405.「それが……オーガの種族王の意志ならば\n その選択は 尊重いたしましょう。:
If that is the will of the Ogre species king,
I will respect that choice.

58406.「ただ オーガという種族が 次の時代から\n 消え去ることを望むのでなければ\n:
But unless you want the Ogre species to
disappear from the next generation, take my
word for it.

58408.「……世告げの姫よ。ゴフェル計画の他に\n 滅びの運命から逃れる手立ては 存在せ:
O Oracle Princess. Is there no other way to
escape the doom of Goffel?

58410.「……人類が 滅びに呑みこまれ\n どこにも逃げ場がなくなってしまった時の\n:
...a last resort when humanity is engulfed by
extinction and there is nowhere to run.

58411.「聖者トゥバンの遺した書によれば\n かつて この世界に到来した災厄は 一度\n:
According to the writings of Saint Thuban, the
plagues that once befell this world were once
repelled by the hands of mankind.

58412.「かつての民は 二度目の災厄の到来に耐えきれず\n ゴフェル計画を 実行に移さざ:
The people of the past, unable to withstand a
second coming of calamity, were forced to
implement the Gofel Plan...

58413.「同じように この時代の者たちが手を取り合い\n 共に災厄に立ち向かえば 私たち:
In the same way, if the people of this age
join hands to face calamities together, we may
be able to defeat them as well.

58414.「明日の世の姿を告げる そなたであっても\n そこから先のことは わからぬという:
You tell us what the world will look like
tomorrow, but you do not know what will happen
next.

58418.「……昔 お母さんが読んでくれた本に\n 書いてありました。かつて 星空の守り人:
...I read in a book my mother used to read to
me. Once upon a time, angels called Goddess'
Grace of the Starry Skies saved this world...

58419.「そして その時代から伝わる 白き剣があると。\n ロディアさんが 持っている剣:
And that there is a white sword that has been handed down from that time. The sword that Rhodia is holding is the legendary White
Sword, isn't it?

58420.「この剣は 白星剣……。\n グレイナル叙事詩の時代……天使が\n この地上に残:
This is the White Star Sword, a sword left on
earth by an angel in the time of the Epic of
Grainall.

58421.「たとえ 私の言葉を信じることができずとも\n この剣のことは 信じていただきた:
Even if you don't believe my words, you must
believe this sword.

58422.「そして この白星剣のもと\n 我らは共に 手を取り合いましょう。:
And under this White Star Sword we shall join
hands together.

58423.「そして 私たちと共に戦ってください。\n かつての この世界の人々が そうした:
And fight with us. As the people of this world
once did. To fight back against the scourge
that is covering the world!

58424.「今のレンダーシアの姿を見て\n 滅びを信じぬ者など この世界にはおらん。:
There's no one in the world who doesn't
believe in Lendersia's destruction after
seeing its current state.

58425.「世告げの姫よ……。\n 我らエルフも共に戦い 共に死のう。:
Oracle Princess we Elves fight and die
together.

58426.「すべての種族が 自分たちの民と共に\n 新たなる時代へ行くまで 我らウェディは:
I promise you that we Weddies will never give
up until all of our species have joined our
people in a new age.

58427.「我らドワーフも 心はひとつだ。: We Dwarves are of one mind.

58428.「オーガという種族は たとえ何が来ようとも\n 一歩も うしろに下がることはない:
The Ogre species will not back down no matter
what comes down upon them.

58429.「今より我らは 世告げの姫と共に戦う！:
From now on, we fight with the Oracle
Princess!

58430.「すべては アストルティアの民のために！: All for the people of Astoltia!

58431.王たちは 誓いを胸に\n自分たちの国へと 帰っていった。:
The kings returned to their own lands with
their vows.

58432.「<pc>さま……。\n ここまで 導いていただいたこと\n 心より 感謝いたし:
<pc>... thank you from the bottom of
my heart for leading us here.

58433.「遠くない未来…… アストルティアに \n 多くの血が流れます。それでも……\n:
In the not too distant future... more blood
will be spilled in Astoltia. And yet... as
long as we live, the light will not go out.
